name: Blur (itch) (mit-mit)
description:
The Odyssey-1 spacecraft has malfunctioned: Major Thomas Davies will need to work hard (with a little help from ground control) to get his sub-systems fixed and safely pilot his craft to the ground. Only catch is that poor old Tom has experienced a partial vision loss, so he'll need to use all of his senses to figure it out.

"Blur" is played mainly via sound and other low-resolution graphical cues, due to the main character's partial vision, which slowly increases in resolution as the game progresses and he regains his sight.

WARNING: The game depends heavily on sound, so plug those headphones in! It's impossible to play without sound :)
